value:
May Prince Marth's knights of Altea
join with the Coyote's Men to protect
Princess Nyna.

Archanean nobles may look down on
the people of Aurelis, but they know
not of the plains people's strength.

An army needs to distribute labor to
function. We will have need of your
tactics later. For now, get some rest.

As an exceptionally good judge of
character, I believe you will achieve
great things, $Nu.

Some here are feeling the tension
before battleâ€”others, the relief of
surviving it. All is as it should be.

I am Hardin, captain of the knights of
Aurelis. I bring tidings on behalf
of $Nf.

Seekers of glory, step forward! Come,
test the blade of Hardin, brother of
the king of Aurelis!

So long as my moniker strikes fear in
the hearts of my enemies, I will howl
"Coyote" like a ferocious beast!
I cannot afford such carelessness.

Feel free to set high expectations for
my knights. They are the best that
Aurelis has to offer.

Hardin, commander of the Coyote's
Men of Aurelis, reporting in. On my
honor, I will never yield to evil.

Summoner, if I may... When will I be
able to return to Aurelis? I am
concerned for my elder brother.$k$pHe has had a good reign, but he was
getting on in years even before I left
to join Altea for Princess Nyna's sake.$k$pI swore upon my life to vanquish
Dolhr, deliver the princess safely to
the capital, and end this nightmare.$k$pThat is my conviction. The Coyote's
Men must be victorious, that our
dreams may finally be realized.$k$pBut perhaps this discussion is best
held for another time. For now, let us
focus on the path that we both share.
You will not get by.
Is that all?
Prepare yourself.
For Princess Nyna!
Princess Nyna...
I am Hardin, captain of the knights of Aurelis.
I see we are prone to acting like children.

The Coyote's Men are as good as they come. Whatever you expect
from them, you will not be disappointed.

Make no mistake, I consider myself an exceptionally
good judge of character.

Princess Nyna would not be pleased
to hear any nitpicking over who will be
listed in the history books.
Princess Nyna... I swear I will protect you always.
I have truly begun to think of you as a friend.
Worry not.
Shall we proceed?
Move out!
